title: Inked in Vegas
description: Synopsis  “We’re going to be married in a week. You’re going to be my husband, and we’re going to live happily ever after.” ~Madden  It feels like I’ve been waiting to marry Thane my entire life. And with our big day only a week away, our friends insist on a bachelor party in Vegas.  An outrageous scavenger hunt, an unexpected trip to the altar, and a wild night with an ex-boyfriend. You know we don’t do anything half-assed.  ***This is a multi-POV novella with lots of sexy times (including one MF and one MMF scene). Unlike the rest of the Heathens Ink series, this one CANNOT be read as a standalone.
author: K.M. Neuhold
